name: klingon-script
description: Klingon-Script compiler (Klingon-keyword JavaScript) for building web apps

scripts.build:warroom: node ./src/copy-warroom-html.js && node ./src/cli.js build ./examples/warroom/state.ks -o ./dist/warroom/state.js && node ./src/cli.js build ./examples/warroom/ui.ks -o ./dist/warroom/ui.js && node ./src/cli.js build ./examples/warroom/app.ks -o ./dist/warroom/app.js
scripts.check:warroom: node ./src/cli.js check ./examples/warroom/state.ks && node ./src/cli.js check ./examples/warroom/ui.ks && node ./src/cli.js check ./examples/warroom/app.ks
